alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL GULF... SOUTHEASTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA AND WEST CENTRAL LIBERTY COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA THROUGH 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 410 PM EDT/310 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek, or 12 miles south of Blountstown, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Sharpstown, Chipola Cutoff, Red Hill, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Estiffanulga, Lewis, Woods, Hugh Creek, and Chipola Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
